text: Dog-friendly with lots of supplies for dogs - water bowls, wash up area, even free treats - our doggy appreciated it. Plenty of outdoor tables to sit at. Food was alright - nasi lemak was good! I would prefer more Asian options but this is good enough for a cafe.

Came on a Saturday late morning. Not crowded and there’s a breeze which makes it pleasant to dine in. Do try the nasi lemak the chicken was deliciously marinated though the portion can be quite small.

It’s a great place to chill on a weekend around the neighbourhood.

There is even a corner where people can exchange books!

Great initiative to promote community living

Strongly recommend!
Dropped by with our dogs and had a pleasant time. The food was great and the coffee was good. Appreciate the pet-friendly environment.

This is a gem in a HDB neighbourhood. You get great coffee and food with excellent service from the owners, Daniel and Cheryl. I really like their mission in their business which is to do good and to help others. They have employed those marginalized in our society. They have also provided a corner where you can donate books as well as borrow a book home to read. It’s pet friendly too.
